actionEnableMsgId.Wiki: MsgID of the menu displayed when the action is enabled

actionFailedMsgId.Wiki: MsgID of the menu to display when the action fails

spQualifiedPassEventFlag.Wiki: Event flag for unconditionally passing special conditions

playerAnimId.Wiki: This is the animation ID of the player character during action

chrAnimId.Wiki: Anime ID for enemy actions etc.

validDist.Wiki: This is the effective distance of the action

objDummyId.Wiki: This is the dummy poly ID that is the action position of the object

isEventKickSync.Wiki: Should the events used in ObjAct execution judgment be synchronized? Basically set to ×. It may be set to ○ only if the actor is not important.

objAnimId.Wiki: This is the animation ID when the object is in action

validPlayerAngle.Wiki: The effective angle of the player's actions. Effective angular difference between the player's orientation vector and the object's orientation vector

validObjAngle.Wiki: The effective angle of the object's action. Effective angle difference between object action vector and character vector

chrSorbType.Wiki: This is how to attract characters during object action

Self.Wiki: Settings for characters interacting with objects
